Your can obtain API key by naviating to: Your can obtain API key by naviating to **Settings->Workspace Settings-> API**.
Adds an existing subscription to a speci: Adds an existing subscription to a specific automation flow.
Retrieves a list of automations for a pu: Retrieves a list of automations for a publication.
Retrieves all posts belonging to a speci: Retrieves all posts belonging to a specific publication.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
The email address of the new subscriptio: The email address of the new subscription.
Whether to reactivate the subscription i: Whether to reactivate the subscription if they have already unsubscribed. Use only if the subscription is knowingly resubscribing.
Whether to send the default welcome emai: Whether to send the default welcome email to the subscription.
The acquisition campaign of the subscrip: The acquisition campaign of the subscription.
The website that the subscription was re: The website that the subscription was referred from.
A subscription's referral_code to give t: A subscription's referral_code to give them credit for the new subscription.
The Stripe customer ID for this subscrip: The Stripe customer ID for this subscription.
Override publication double-opt settings: Override publication double-opt settings for this subscription.
The IDs of the premium tiers this subscr: The IDs of the premium tiers this subscription is associated with.
Enroll the subscription into automations: Enroll the subscription into automations after their subscription has been created.
Set the tier for this subscription.
The Stripe Customer ID of the subscripti: The Stripe Customer ID of the subscription.
Whether to unsubscribe this subscription: Whether to unsubscribe this subscription from the publication.
The email address of the subscription. P: The email address of the subscription. Provide either Email or Subscription ID.
Override publication double-opt settings: Override publication double-opt settings for this subscription (e.g., "on").
A limit on the number of automations to: A limit on the number of automations to be returned (1-100, default 10).
Optionally expand the results by adding: Optionally expand the results by adding additional information.
Filter posts by content tags. Returns po: Filter posts by content tags. Returns posts with ANY of the specified tags.
Number of posts to return (1-100, defaul: Number of posts to return (1-100, default 10).
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when a new post is sent.
Triggers when a new subscriber confirms: Triggers when a new subscriber confirms their subscription.
